function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of linear regression instead of Poisson model","Impact":"Inaccurate analysis of contagious disease propagation","Mitigation":"Use Poisson model or other appropriate statistical methods","Technologies":"Poisson modeling, statistical software","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Data analysis team, research team"},{"Description":"Sensitivity of findings to selected years","Impact":"Unreliable conclusions about contagious disease propagation trends","Mitigation":"Conduct sensitivity analysis, consider broader time range","Technologies":"Statistical software, data visualization tools","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Data analysis team, research team"},{"Description":"Dependency on specific states in the analysis","Impact":"Biased results in the analysis of contagious disease propagation","Mitigation":"Ensure inclusion of diverse state data, conduct state-specific analysis","Technologies":"Data aggregation tools, statistical software","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Data analysis team, research team"}]}
